title: Phantom Breaker Battle Grounds Update 1&2
description:
Whats this?
-----------
Update 1 and 2 (v1.04) for Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds

The updates are for ALI213 release. May (or may not) work with 3DM, TPTB, and PLAZA releases.


What is included?
-----------------
Phantom.Breaker.Battle.Grounds.Update.1.Incl.DLC-ALI213.rar
Phantom.Breaker.Battle.Grounds.Update.2.Incl.DLC-ALI213.rar
Readme.txt


Total: 3 files
Checksums in pastebin: /raw.php?i=xD9aQ1nH


What's New?
-----------

V1.03 - 03/12/2015
 
Ã¢â€”â€ [ADD] Kurisu DLC.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] General performance updates to improve framerates for users experiencing unacceptable slowdown/low framerates.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Corrected a situation where progress triggers in some stages would fail, preventing players from completing the stage.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] The game should now properly remember the display settings (full screen) when you quit.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] The autosave notification at the start of the game has been removed.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] The continue screen on the Battlegrounds mode should now work properly.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Some corrections were made to the text of the Italian translation.
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Some changes to accommodate the Kurisu pack DLC update.

v1.04 detail 
Ã¢â€”â€ [ADD] Achievements are now active. Any achievements you should already have received will be unlocked on first startup. 
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Save problem have been resolved. The save size is back to 7kb and the problem on first save creation should be solved for all configuration. 
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Multiplay using keyboard and one controller is now available: whichever you use first when starting the game will be player 1, and you can use the other for player 2. 
Ã¢â€”â€ [FIX] Keyboard keys "T" and "I" should now work normally 


Whats missing?
--------------

No new updates...


Thanks goes to?
---------------

ALI213
The guys fromn cs.rin.ru, awesome awesome group!
P2P networks and the file sharing groups.


Words of wisdom
---------------

Like it?, BUY IT!. Software developers are NOT slaves, they develop things like the software containg in this torrent for living. If people stop supporting them, they will eventualy stop developing nice stuff like this.
